name: biblegateway.com - High-contrast passages
description: This style makes the text of passages from biblegateway.com larger, providing a very black-and-white reading experience for older people.
additional_info: This style blanks out the front page. This is because the search function, verse of the day and other advertising is removed from the website. Do not print verses using printer view with this style enabled. This style is only intended for displaying bible verses, and nothing more; For search, you can use your address bar. For other places (like links in publisher info, bottom of all verse pages), those have remain (mostly) unedited. Red letters have a slightly darker colour for reader comfort. Footnotes and references are pale yellow, as well the reference verses in any selection. Recommended extensions for Firefox Omnibar - Merges address and search bars together Add to Search Bar - Easily add engines via context menu Before applying this style, add all the bible versions you want into your search bar from either the Add to Search Bar extension or from MyCroft. After, use your search bar to look up passages as book ch.:verse. Multiple verses have their beginning and end delimited by a hyphen / dash (-). Multiple selections are delimited by a semicolon (;).
